attributes.action: Support Woolworths and help promote it to be sold as a going concern rather than breaking the company up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is concern that the administrators of Woolworths will break the company up and sell it's stores to other supermarkets meaning the end of Woolworths forever. Woolworths should be kept as a going concern. This would help save many of the smaller towns who rely on this store to keep thier town centres thriving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
